name: Play Tennis 2016 - Open tennis tournament and quick games
name_original: Play Tennis 2016 - Open tennis tournament and quick games
description:
World’s leading 3D single player tennis game for 2016. Game is equipped with 3D physics mechanics and realistic shots, easy to play controls yet challenging and enjoyable features.

Game has two modes
-Quick Match: Quick match allows you to challenge a team randomly.
-Tournament: Tournament is based on knockout system. It comprises of four matches. You have to win all matches in order to qualify for finals.

If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at techmowo@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I'll be glad to fix that.
Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.
